parameters.description:
Contains the Location Type, the Locator Node Sysid, and
                    a list of Resource Group Sysids used to identify which
                    locations to return.
parameters.name: _req

operations.notes:
Retrieves a list of Location Data values matching the Location Data Type provided in the Location Request. Each Location Data value provides the Locator Node Sysid and Venue Node Sysid of the geographical location that the value represents.

The Location Data values are retrieved for Locations defined by the Account that the given Application Authentication Token represents.

This operation requires a Location Data Request argument. The request has the following fields:

Name Data Type RequiredDescription
locationDataTypeValue Integer value of the requested Locator Data Type to use to filter the locations result. REQUIRED The Types of Locations to search for the operation. Based on the Location Data Type, locations under the given sysidLocatorNode value (if any) will be searched to determine if they match the criteria identified by this search option. Note that searches which are *allocated* require that the sysidApplicationUser field is populated with the SYSID of a valid User for whom the allocation relationships should apply. Searched which are identified as active searches will only search those locations which are currently active. Those searches marked as all will return both active and inactive locations.
sysidLocatorNode Integer value of the unique Locator Node to use to filter the locations result. CONDITIONAL The starting point for searching for locations which match the request criteria. If the location data type value is a value of TOP_LOCATIONS_ACTIVE_NON_ALLOCATED (1), TOP_LOCATIONS_ACTIVE_ALLOCATED (2), TOP_LOCATIONS_ALL_NON_ALLOCATED (3), or TOP_LOCATIONS_ALL_ALLOCATED (4), a starting locator node ID is not required. Otherwise, all locations under the given locator node, and matching the other request criteria, will be returned.
sysidApplicationUser Integer value unique ID of the User Data value whose allocations should be used for determining available locations. CONDITIONAL If the Location Data Type provided requests ALLOCATED locations be returned, only those locations which contains Resources to which the User identified has an allocated relationship will be returned. See User Data for more information about allocations.
sysidAllocRelationshipTypes Array of Integer values representing unique IDs of the Allocation Relationship Type to use when filtering results by Allocations. CONDITIONAL If the Locations are to be filtered by User Allocations, the Allocation Relationship Type describes what type of Allocation Relationship the User must have with a resource at the location for that location to be returned in the result set. See User Data for more information about allocations.

This operation returns a Location Data Wrapper which contains the following attributes:

Name Data Type Description
locations An Array of Location Data values. See Location Data.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Access

If the Application Authentication token is invalid, the following exception is returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the application cannot be authenticated using the provided AQOB-AppAuthToken token.

Account Not Found

If the application or account associated with the authentication token provided cannot be found in the System, the following exception may be returned:

  • Not Found Exception if no location data elements were found for the Application Account.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
This operation searches venues within a location which correspond to a user's allocation permissions. The criteria argument provided must provide the SYSID of a location which contains those venues to be searched. This differs from the venue view search in that the Location of the Venue is known, and the venues within that location are being searched based on the user's permissions.

This operation requires a Venue Location Criteria argument.

This operation returns a Venue View Wrapper with the following attributes:

Name Data Type Description
views List of Venue Location View values Venue Location Views describe a Venue Locaiton. These views will be in the order requested by the submitted criteria search value.
hasAdditional Boolean value Flag indicating that additional results may be queried from the agilquest system. Additional calls to the operation that update the criteria Start Row to the next start row value included in this result will retrieve the additional results for this query.
nextStartRow Integer value Numeric Index of the next result set row to use for retrieving additional results for the same query. Used for pagination.
count Integer value Numeric count of Reservation Views returned in this result set. Additional calls may return with additional results depending on the next start row configuration.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to manage Locator Nodes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Venue Not Found

If the Sysid value provided does not match an existing Locator Node in the System, the following exception will be returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Locator cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
This operation returns all Locator Node values associated with the Forum which is the home account forum for the authenticated requesting user. Venue Node values are excluded from the list of returned locators.

Locator Nodes are used to define and describe location information in a tree hierarchy. Parent locator nodes represent 'areas' which 'contain' the locations represented by child locator nodes.

The user must either be the System Administrator, or the Home Account of the user must be set as the Forum Owner for the Forum with which the user authentication token is associated.

All locators are returned, regardless of the active flag setting of the node.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_LOCATIONS ALWAYS

This operation returns a Locator Node Wrapper which contains the following fields:

Name Data Type Description
locators Array of Locator Node values The Locator Nodes within the Forum associated with the user's Home Accout.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User cannot authenticate or does not have permissions to view the Locator Nodes, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Wrapper containing a List of LocatorNode elements to create.
parameters.name: _locators

operations.notes:
Creates Locator Nodes within the System. The Locator Nodes are validated against the Locator Structure already created for the Account associated with the User creating the Locator Nodes. The hierarchy of the submitted Locator Nodes is compared against this pre-existing Locator Structure.

Locator Nodes are used to define and describe location information in a tree hierarchy. Parent locator nodes represent 'areas' which 'contain' the locations represented by child locator nodes.

See the Locator Node description for more information about the attributes and structure of a Locator Node.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_LOCATIONS ALWAYS

This operation requires a Locator Node Wrapper argument. The request has the following fields:

Name Data Type RequiredDescription
locators Array of Locator Node values REQUIRED The Locator Nodes to create.

The operation returns a Locator Node Wrapper with the system representation of all locator nodes succesfully created.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to create Locator Nodes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Locator Node Data

If the provided Locator Node data values include invalid data attributes, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Location Exception if the location values provided fail validation.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes: This operation updates the existing Locator Nodes in the Forum.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to update Locator Nodes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Locator Node Data

If the Locator Node data values provided include invalid data attributes, the following exceptions may be returned:

  • Location Exception if the location values provided fail validation.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description:
A wrapper class with a list of LocatorNode elements
                          and a list of LocatorStructure elements. The locator
                          structure defines how locator nodes are to be organized 
                          and at what level a node must have a Venue. 
                          The LocatorNode is a user-defined, self referencing 
                          data object that will be used to drill down to Containers with Resources
parameters.name: _updateRequest

operations.notes:
Updates the Locator Nodes and Locator Structures identified in the provided arrays. In cases where new Locator Nodes or Locator Structures are inserted in their respective hierarchies (i.e. new values are included in the children array field of a Locator Node or Locator Structure being updated), new Locator Nodes or Locator Structures will be created in the System. Likewise, in cases where Locator Nodes or Locator Structures have been removed from their respective hierarchies, those missing Nodes and Structures will be marked as deleted in the System.

Locator Nodes are used to define and describe location information in a tree hierarchy. Parent locator nodes represent 'areas' which 'contain' the locations represented by child locator nodes.

Locations and Location Structures are updated as sets of data. When a Location set is updated, any locations that are removed from the original set created will be deleted from the System. Any Locator Nodes added to the set as part of the Update operation will be added to the System. Likewise, Locator Structures are added and removed as they are present in the update set.

Note: If a Locator Node has a Venue Node within its tree, that Locator Node cannot be deleted from the set. Locator Structures which are associated with existing Locator Nodes also cannot be deleted.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_LOCATIONS ALWAYS

This operation requires an Update Locations Request argument. The request has the following attributes:

Name Data Type RequiredDescription
structures Array of Locator Structure values ALWAYS The Locator Structures to update with the Locator Nodes.
locators Array of Locator Node values ALWAYS The Locator Nodes to update.

This operation returns a Locator Node Wrapper with the following attributes:

Name Data Type Description
locators Array of Locator Node values The Updated Locator Nodes.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to update Locator Nodes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Locator Node Data

If the Locator Node data values provided include invalid data attributes, the following exceptions may be returned:

  • Location Exception if the location values provided fail validation.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
This operation adds an image to the collection of images representing a location. These images are displayed to end users when browsing a collection of Locations (Venues and Lower Venues) at which the user may wish to reserve an Asset (such as a workspace or other asset type).

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_VENUES ALWAYS

This operation requires a Multipart form data object to upload an Image file.

This operation returns a Location Image Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to manage Locator Nodes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Venue Not Found

If the Sysid value provided does not match an existing Locator Node in the System, the following exception will be returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Locator cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Adds a Location Map Image for a given Locator node. Note that each location may only have a finite number of images as determined by the system properties.

A Map Image is an image on which Map Locator Images, or hotspots, may be drawn. The purpose of the map image is to provide a map of the represented Locator Node (e.g. Floors, Wings, etc.).

Images may only be added for Venue and Lower Venue Nodes.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_VENUES ALWAYS

This operation requires a Multipart form data object to upload an Image file.

This operation returns a Location Map Image Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to manage Locator Nodes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Venue Not Found

If the Sysid value provided does not match an existing Locator Node in the System, the following exception will be returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Locator cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
This operation returns all map locator images which may be drawn over a base Location Map Image. The locators may be used by an application to create the locators used when updating venue map locators.

This operation returns a Locator Image Wrapper with the following attributes:

NameData TypeDescription
locatorImages Array of type Locator Image Array of all images which may be used to represent resources and their various states on a base Location Map image.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exception is returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
This operation updates all Map Locator Image locations on each Location Map Image included in the provided Update Venue Maps argument.

The Update Venue Maps argument includes a list of Update Map Locators values. Each of these values includes a Location Map Image Data value, which is the base image on which the resource locator images will be laid out, and a list of locators which provide the details of how each map locator image will be drawn over the base map image.

This operation requires a Update Venue Maps value.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_VENUES ALWAYS

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to manage Venues or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Venue Not Found

If the Sysid value provided does not match an existing Locator Node in the System, the following exception will be returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Locator cannot be found.

Invalid Resource Locator or Location Map

The following exceptions are returned if the Resource Locator data or Location Map data provided are invalid:

  • Location Exception if the Location Map Image Data provided is invalid.
  • Resource Exception if the Resource Locator data provided is invalid.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Validates and creates the Location Structures to use for the Forum which is the home Account for the requesting user. Location Structures define how Locator Nodes are organized and at what level a node must have a Venue. Each locator structure represents a hierarchical level, with structures having parent and child structures to represent the overall location hierarchy.

This operation takes a Locator Structure Wrapper argument with the following attributes:

Name Data Type RequiredDescription
structures Locator Structure REQUIRED List of Locator Structure data elements to create within the System.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_LOCATIONS ALWAYS

The service returns a Locator Structure Wrapper argument with the following attributes:

Name Data Type Description
structures Locator Structure List of created Locator Structure data elements with unique system ID values.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to create Location Structures or the User has been expired, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Location Data Conflict

If the Location Structure that the submitted data value includes invalid data attributes, the following exception is be returned:

  • Location Exception if the if the Locator Structures provided cannot be validated.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
This operation returns all Locator Structure values associated with the Forum which is the home account forum for the authenticated requesting user.

The user must either be the System Administrator, or the Home Account of the user must be set as the Forum Owner for the Forum with which the user authentication token is associated.

This operation returns a Locator Structure Wrapper which contains the following fields:

Name Data Type Description
structures Array of Locator Structure values The Locator Structures associated with the Forum that is the user's Home Account.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the user is not authenticated or does not have the required permissions to perform the operation, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Structure Not Found

If the Structure for the Location Data has not yet been created for the Account associated with the User Authentication Token, the following exception will be returned:

  • Not Found Exception if no locator structures were found for the forum that is the home account setting for the user.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: {@link VenueNode} to include as part of bulk import process
parameters.name: _venue

operations.notes:
Performs importing of venue node information as part of bulk import. Refresh Cache must be invoked for changes to be reflected in database. This operation is intended to be called multiple times before the refresh cache operation.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_VENUES ALWAYS

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to update Locator Nodes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Locator Node Data

If the Locator Node data values provided include invalid data attributes, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Location Exception if the location values provided fail validation.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes: Must be called after venues are added to the bulk import service

parameters.description: Venue Node to create within the system.
parameters.name: _venue

operations.notes:
Creates a new Venue Node within the System. The System representation of the Venue Node is returned, which includes the unique system ID identifying the Venue Node in the system.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_VENUES ALWAYS

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to update Locator Nodes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Locator Node Data

If the Locator Node data values provided include invalid data attributes, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Location Exception if the location values provided fail validation.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Modifies the identified Venue Node and associated Venue data values with the provided values passed into the end point. A Venue Node is a specialized Locator Node that represents a Venue, and has a one-to-one relationship with the Venue data structure. Only a Venue Node and those Locator Nodes organized hierarchically beneath a venue node may be associated with resources.

Requires a Venue Node value argument.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_VENUES ALWAYS
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ANOTHERS_RESERVATIONS If the venue has non-final reservations

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to update Venue Nodes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Venue Not Found

If the Venue Node provided does not match an existing Venue Node in the System, the following exception will be returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Venue data could not be validated.

Venue Data Conflict

If the Venue Node data values provided include invalid data attributes, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Venue Exception if the Venue data could not be validated.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: {@link VenueViewCriteria} value to use while searching for Venues
parameters.name: _criteria

operations.notes:
Searches for all Venues within the Forum, regardless of the user's permissions to use assets within the Venue.

This operation requires a Venue View Criteria value.

This operation returns a Venue View Wrapper with the following attributes:

Name Data Type Description
views List of Venue View values Venue Views describe a Venue. These views will be in the order requested by the submitted criteria search value.
hasAdditional Boolean value Flag indicating that additional results may be queried from the agilquest system. Additional calls to the operation that update the criteria Start Row to the next start row value included in this result will retrieve the additional results for this query.
nextStartRow Integer value Numeric Index of the next result set row to use for retrieving additional results for the same query. Used for pagination.
count Integer value Numeric count of Reservation Views returned in this result set. Additional calls may return with additional results depending on the next start row configuration.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to view Venue Nodes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Venue Not Found

If the Sysid value provided does not match an existing Venue Node within the System, the following exception will be returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Venue data could not be validated.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Integer Locator Node ID of the Venue Node to retrieve.
parameters.name: sysidLocator

operations.notes:
Gets the Venue Node identified by the Locator Node ID path parameter value. A Venue Node is a specialized Locator Node that represents a Venue, and has a one-to-one relationship with the Venue Node data structure. Only a Venue Node and those Locator Nodes organized hierarchically beneath a venue node may be associated with resources.

The Locator Node ID and the Venue Node ID are two separate IDs. The Venue Node includes both System ID values. The Locator Node ID of the Venue Node must be used as the path parameter for this operation.

Returns a Venue Node.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to view Venue Nodes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Venue Not Found

If the Sysid value provided does not match an existing Venue Node within the System, the following exception will be returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Venue data could not be validated.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Integer unique system ID of the Venue node being deleted.
parameters.name: sysidLocator

operations.notes:
Deletes a single Venue Node as identified by the Sysid Locator Node provided in the operation path parameter. This action also will delete all Locator Nodes below the venue level. Before a Venue Node can be deleted, it must be updated as inactive first to prevent it from being reserved.

The Locator Node System ID is used because the Venue Node is a type of Locator Node.

The requesting User must have the following rights to perform this task:

RightsRequired
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_VENUES ALWAYS
AuthRuleType.DELETE_LOCATIONS ALWAYS
AuthRuleType.MANAGE_ANOTHERS_RESERVATIONS If the venue has non-final reservations

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to delete Venue Nodes or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Venue Not Found

If the Sysid value provided does not match an existing Venue Node in the System, the following exception will be returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Venue to delete cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes: This operation returns the Location Data associated with the given SYSID Locator value provided as part of the End Point URL path.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User cannot authenticate or does not have permissions to view the Locator Nodes, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Location Not Found

If the provided SYSID Locator value is not found in the system, the following exception is returned:

Not Found Exception if the provided SYSID Locator does not match an existing Locator in the calling User's forum.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.
